application.name: 时光轴
application.description: 通过类似时光轴的形式，对某些活动流程或重要的事件进行展示
application.author: topone4tvs

manifest.install: DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `ims_timeaxis`; CREATE TABLE `ims_timeaxis` ( `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `weid` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, `title` varchar(50) NOT NULL COMMENT '活动名称', `time` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL, `bgimg` varchar(255) NOT NULL COMMENT '背景图片或颜色', `bgcol` varchar(30) NOT NULL COMMENT '内容背景色', `items` varchar(5000) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`,`weid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=1 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `ims_timeaxis_rep`; CREATE TABLE `ims_timeaxis_rep` ( `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `rid` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, `weid` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, `reptitle` varchar(100) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `repinfo` varchar(255) DEFAULT '', `repimg` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `axisid` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL COMMENT '时光轴活动id', PRIMARY KEY (`id`,`rid`,`weid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
